price: . (Musa) akasema: Ndiye Mola Mlezi wa Mashariki na Magharibi na viliomo baina yao, ikiwa nyinyi mnatia akilini.
arabic: قَالَ رَبُّ ٱلۡمَشۡرِقِ وَٱلۡمَغۡرِبِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَآۖ إِن كُنتُمۡ تَعۡقِلُونَ
footnotes: Musa akasema: Ikiwa nyinyi mna akili, basi uaminini Ujumbe wangu. Kwani kuchomoza jua na kuchwa kwake kwa mpango madhubuti ni dalili wazi ya Mwenye kuumba. Kwa hivyo basi ni nyinyi ndio mnastahiki kuambiwa wendawazimu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbu al-mashriqi wal-maghribi wamā baynahumā in kuntum taʿqilūna
